info.title: Egress from Dwelling Units
info.subtitle: Volume II - 9.9.9.
info.description: Location and distances of exits from living spaces in a building

1_9991.sectionTitle: 9.9.9.1. Travel limit to Exits or Egress Doors

R10.resultDisplayMessage: Based on the building characteristics provided, this dwelling unit meets the provision of Subsection 9.9.9. ‘Egress from Dwelling Units’.

R30.resultDisplayMessage: Based on the building characteristics provided this dwelling unit or building is not governed by Part 9 of the Building Code or is not a dwelling unit. This tool is only designed to address the egress from dwelling units of Part 9 buildings.
